title: [EUW][S][Diamond] Team Looking for Jungler
body:
Hey, we are currently a team consisting of 4 D5 to D2 players and we are looking for a D4+ Jungler to fill out our roster. So far we have been practicing in scrims versus other teams and we have been participating in several tournaments. Our goal is to continue to play and improve this way, and possibly attend LAN tournaments across Central Europe. These are our minimum requirements. Players who dont meet these expectations will be disqualified immediately:

SoloQ rank of Diamond 4+
Good understanding of the game
Champion pool fitting the meta
Fluent in English or German
Be team-compatible
Positive attitude
Be able to take criticism
Be able and willing to play at least 3 sets of 2 - 3 hours a week
If you are interested, add scilyfe#6827 and Balrog70#6164 on Discord AND apply with your OP.GG and well-prepared answers for the following questions:

1) Why do you want to join our team?

2) What do you expect and want from the team?

3) What are your experiences with playing in a team environment?

4) How would you describe your playstyle?

5) List your top 3 picks and describe your Champion pool.

6) During what times are you consistently free to play?

7) What can YOU offer the team?
